title: coinremitter
author: coinremitter
content: I strongly believe that bitcoin has very strong security and it is impossible to fake or cheat the bitcoin payment network furthermore it has greater liquidity because while converting to other currencies bitcoin maintains most of its values.

comments.author: DapanasFruit
comments.body: Yes, we all believe the same things too on Bitcoin and these things are quite basic or elementary when we are describing it. So far, there has been no technology yet that can threat the secure nature of Bitcoin though we don't know for sure what can be years from now - and I leave that to creative minds to think of the future of Bitcoin. Now, of course, we know that being crypto Bitcoin is very volatile as any development that can affect it or one that can be impacting the people holding the coins can push its value in the market down or up. As many institutions are now into Bitcoin their decisions can be creating the directions of where the market is going. I am looking at Bitcoin as a medium for the people to experience more freedom away from the controls and eye-watching power of the government or its agencies...but of course this fact alone can also be making Bitcoin the focus of those people.

comments.author: Ever-young
comments.body: Quote from: coinremitter on March 15, 2023, 09:09:06 AMI strongly believe that bitcoin has very strong security and it is impossible to fake or cheat the bitcoin payment network furthermore it has greater liquidity because while converting to other currencies bitcoin maintains most of its values. The security is not just what makes Bitcoin unique, it's transparency is a added features to why I believe we bitcoiners lover and believe so much on Bitcoin. I believe and I know Bitcoin have come to stay and make the payment system better than it has ever been. Bitcoin value may pump and dump but they are just for some times the real value is yet to come, I believe today Bitcoin price might turns out to bra reference in what we will see in the near future.
